title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you swap in any Ollama model as an LLM or chat provider with two lines of code.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); markdown, code highlighting, model manager, multi-user, Docker image.

title: ollama-cli (sammcj/ollama-cli)
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper with chat REPL, model search, one-line installers and GitHub Actions matrix runner.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that pipes Copilot-style suggestions through any Ollama model; local, private, offline.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma; ingest PDFs and chat over them in <50 lines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Spring Boot starter, Android compatible.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service + model cache inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-chatbot (vercel-labs/ollama-chatbot)
summary: Next.js chatbot template streaming answers from Ollama; deploy to Vercel in one click.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and Unity via NuGet.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; tokio & reqwest under the hood.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model to your server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that wraps Ollama for quick internal apps; supports file upload RAG and conversation export.

title: ollama-model-zoo
summary: Community-curated list of 300+ GGUF models ready to run with Ollama, including quantized variants and benchmarks.

title: ollama-nvidia-jetson
summary: Docker images and docs for running Ollama on NVIDIA Jetson devices with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-github-action
summary: GitHub Action to install Ollama and pre-pull models in CI; useful for testing LLM-powered CLI tools.

title: ollama-rfcs
summary: Public RFC repo where the Ollama team discusses upcoming features like multi-modal, function-calling and clustering.
